next_window: Watch for a potential retest of Pivot R1 at 143.8223, and monitor DXY for continued support above Pivot R1 at 99.13.
summary: Given the closing strength of DXY near its Pivot R1 and the upward movement of USD/JPY closing near its high, a long position is favored. DXY strength supports USD/JPY longs, suggesting upward momentum may continue.
